meaningMnemonic: You have <kanji>sincerity</kanji> and you have <kanji>truth</kanji>. You are so <vocabulary>sincere</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>honest</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>faithful</vocabulary>, good friend.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
